snippet.title: AMazing TD - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
AMazing TD is a deep strategy game about building mazes and challenging each other in a competitive Tower Defense gameplay.

Every map has distinct randomized tiles, which makes every maze you create unique.

Steam store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1140030/AMazing_TD
Google Play (Android store): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Go4.AMazing
Discord: https://discord.gg/7yYTKgU
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AMazingTD/

SINGLEPLAYER
Reach higher waves and score more damage than anyone else on your skill level. Leaderboard's maps reset weekly or daily. After the reset, new pseudo-random maps are generated and you are ranked based on your maze wave level and damage. Improve your strategy game and excel in your tower defense skills!

MULTIPLAYER
Play against other players in fair real-time battles. You and your opponent interact on a mirrored map, where you can affect your opponent's maze. You can even maze together in a mutual area. Design superior mazes and make more damage than your opponent to win the match!

CAMPAIGN
Learn the basics of the game in a 19 missions campaign as you uncover new stars and constellations in the night sky. Compare your score on each mission against the best players.

OVERVIEW
-Endless maps, games only end when you run out of lives
-Unlimited variations of randomized maps provide original gameplay every time
-Up to 16x wave speed up
-Real-time online PvP multiplayer fights across the world
-Daily and Weekly global leaderboards with unique maps
-Comparative playback of other player's game
-Skill level progression
-Unsurpassed TD game design with many unique map properties
-Detailed 3D graphics
-Steady development, there is a lot more to come!

Unlike in most tower defense games, there is no ultimate strategy nor the best build order, nor the best place for your towers. Each map is a new challenge to test your skills.

AMazing TD is made by the same team who were behind the popular tower defense named Entropy TD and Random TD from Starcraft 2. They are loosely based on Split TD from Warcraft 3. 

Music based on Nicolás Iaconis's music, check him out at:
Instagram: @nikoiaconis
Twitter/YouTube: nikoiaconis
